titleStmt.title: Site Index of Named Entities in Russian Movie Theater Project Archive
titleStmt.author: Elena Prokhorova
Alexander Prokhorov
Thomas Elvins

editionStmt.edition: TEI version of original XML index file of the Russian Movie Theater Project.

availability.p: The project is approved by Protection of Human Subjects Committee (PHSC) of the College of William and Mary.
availability.licence: Distributed via permission from interviewee (given in the Deed of Gift to the College of William and Mary)

sourceDesc.p: This index stands as a compilation of people, places, titles, genres, and national cinemas referenced in the interviews.

person.role: General Secretary of the Communist Party
